name: Stronghold Keep
description:
Hack and Slash Dungeon Crawler 

Fight through several levels of dangerous enemies while collecting journal pages and items, in order to face off against the King of the Dungeon.

An spring semester project created by us below:

Player and Level Programmer: Jay Franklin

Enemy AI Programmer: Max Sichel

Character Modeler and Animator: Daniel Stockbridge

Environmental Artist, Level Designer, and UI Artist: Noah Akinloba

UI Designer, Level Designer, and Project Manager: Kyler Kubo

Writer and Sound Designer: Jordan Peloquin
